subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Marc Staal, a defenseman, scored the first goal in the Rangers’ 2-1 victory against the Senators, making his comeback from a severe concussion complete.
snippet: Marc Staal, a defenseman, scored the first goal in the Rangers’ 2-1 victory against the Senators, making his comeback from a severe concussion complete.
